allow: Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS store_rating_db; SHOW DATABASES;")
Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "SHOW TABLES; SELECT COUNT(*) as admin_count FROM users WHERE role=''admin'';")
Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "SELECT id, name, email, role FROM users WHERE role=''admin'';")
Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "SELECT password FROM users WHERE email=''admin@system.com'';")

Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "UPDATE users SET password=''$2a$10$Pdx29ekHBLlXzOjTL/BHKuCsi6trvoJGnah.klzeurPqVNkcx6yce'' WHERE email=''admin@system.com''; SELECT ''Password updated successfully'' as result;")
Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "DELETE FROM users WHERE email=''admin@system.com'';")

Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "INSERT INTO users (name, email, password, address, role) VALUES (''System Administrator Account'', ''admin@system.com'', ''$2a$10$Pdx29ekHBLlXzOjTL/BHKuCsi6trvoJGnah.klzeurPqVNkcx6yce'', ''123 Admin Street, System City, Country'', ''admin''); SELECT ''Admin user created'' as result;")

Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "UPDATE users SET password=''$2a$10$43YItjOjQ5Sm7hL/xr3m4eGPdgjN75ykk3LlilsxV67L.QuEDyGNO'' WHERE email=''admin@system.com''; SELECT ''Password updated successfully'' as result;")
Bash("C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysql.exe" -u root store_rating_db -e "SELECT LEFT(password, 30) as password_start FROM users WHERE email=''admin@system.com'';")
